issue.title: [C++] Support type promotion in basic evolution strategy
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17757](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17757). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Most of the pieces are in place for this.  If a fragment has int32 and the dataset schema is int64 for example then the basic evolution strategy should be able to safely cast.

We might even consider supporting unsafe casts like int64 -> int32 if we can detect overflow and raise an error.
